name: ajuro-ui-angular
readme:
ajuro-ui Angular Component
==============

This project contains the Angular Component for use with ajuro-ui

**Note:** *ajuro-ui-ng2* is now **deprecated**. Please *ajuro-ui-angular* going forward.

ajuro-ui-ng2 8.0.0 ~= ajuro-ui-angular 8.0.0

All releases from 8.1 onwards will released under ajuro-ui-angular, and hosted under [https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular)


#### Install with Bower
```sh
$ bower install ajuro-ui-angular
```

#### Install with Npm
```sh
$ npm install ajuro-ui-angular
```

See [www.ajuro-ui.com](http://www.ajuro-ui.com) for an overview and full documentation.

Frameworks Supported
====================
Framework specific Getting Started guides:

[Angular 1](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-angularjs-data-grid/) | [Angular 2](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-angular-2-data-grid/) | [Aurelia](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-aurelia-data-grid/) | [Javascript](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-javascript-data-grid/) | [React](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-react-data-grid/) | [TypeScript](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/ajuro-ui-typescript-webpack-2/) | [VueJS](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-vuejs-data-grid/) | [Web Components](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-web-component-data-grid/)


#### To Build
- `npm install gulp -g`
- `npm install npm-install-peers -g`
- `npm install`
- `npm-install-peers`
- `npm run clean-build`

## Examples

See the [https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example) for full 
working examples of what you can do with ajuro-ui and Angular Components.

Examples included are:

## Rich Grid with Pure JavaScript
![Rich Grid with Pure JavaScript](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/rich-grid.png?raw=true "Rich Grid with Pure JavaScript")
## Rich Grid with Declarative Markup
![Rich Grid with Declarative Markup](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/declarative.png?raw=true "Rich Grid with Declarative Markup")
## Using Dynamic Components
![Using Dynamic Components](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/dynamic.png?raw=true "Using Dynamic Components")
## Using Dynamic Components - Richer Example
![Using Dynamic Components - Richer Example](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/rich-dynamic.png?raw=true "Using Dynamic Components - Richer Example")
## Using Cell Editor Components
![Using Cell Editor Components](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/editor.png?raw=true "Using Cell Editor Components")
## Using Pinned Row Renderers
![Using Pinned Row Renderers](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/floating-row.png?raw=true "Using Pinned Row Renderers")
## Using Full Width Renderers
![Using Full Width Renderers](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/full-width.png?raw=true "Using Full Width Renderers")
## Using Group Row Renderers
![Using Group Row Renderers](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/grouped-row.png?raw=true "Using Group Row Renderers")
## With Filters Components
![With Filters Components](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/filter.png?raw=true "With Filters Components")
## Master Detail Example
![Master Detail Example](https://github.com/ceolter/ajuro-ui-angular-example/blob/master/docs/images/master-detail.png?raw=true "Master Detail Example")

Frameworks Supported
====================
Framework specific Getting Started guides:
[Angular 1](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-angularjs-data-grid/) | [Angular 2](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-angular-2-data-grid/) | [Aurelia](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-aurelia-data-grid/)
[Javascript](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-javascript-data-grid/) | [React](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-react-data-grid/) | [TypeScript](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/ajuro-ui-typescript-webpack-2/)
[VueJS](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-vuejs-data-grid/) | [Web Components](https://www.ajuro-ui.com/best-web-component-data-grid/)

scripts.build: npm run build-no-verify && npm run verify-properties
scripts.build-gulp: npm run build-no-verify-gulp && npm run verify-properties
scripts.build-no-verify: ngc -p tsconfig-src.json && npm run clean-src && ngc -p tsconfig-main.json
scripts.clean: rimraf aot/* && rimraf dist/* && npm run clean-main
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean-build-no-verify: npm run clean && npm run build-no-verify
scripts.clean-main: rimraf main.metadata.json && rimraf main.js* && rimraf main.d.ts
